title: The Wizard's Council
description: Emily finds her life turned upside down when her master, an Archwizard named Owyn, is murdered. Alone and on the run, she makes for the southern kingdoms. The nefarious and menacing Knights of Doom, led by a magician named Arcantos, are hot on her tail as she seeks refuge among her fellow Wizards. Will she make it to safety or will she find her way into the clutches of Arcantos?Paul's decade long quest for revenge has brought him to the kingdom of Galimdor. Unbeknownst to them, he has been stalking the Knights of Doom for years. Will his quest for revenge lead him to victory or will the jaws of defeat come closing around him?Rolin, the new leader of the Wizards, seeks to stem the tide of chaos. He sends his most trusted companions on missions to gather allies for a coming war. Will his efforts succeed or will the forces stacked against him be too much to overcome?Enter the world of Canai as it descends into turmoil. With the fate of the land at stake, our heroes must face fear, danger, rejection, and even death to find what they seek. Does this ragtag group of three have what it takes to stop the Knights of Doom and usher in a new era of peace?
author: Cody J. Sherer
